text: Durai Murugan Kathir Anand (born 19 January 1975) is an Indian politician and Member of Parliament, elected from Tamil Nadu. He is the son of the DMK Treasurer and Deputy Leader of the Opposition in the Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly, Durai Murugan. ==Elections== Kathir Anand has been elected as an MP in the 17th Lok Sabha, from the Vellore constituency. This was his first direct electoral performance. === Lok Sabha Election === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Election !Party !Constituency !Result !Votes gained !Vote % |- |2019 |17th Lok Sabha election |Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam |Vellore | |4,85,340 |47.3% |} == References == ==External links== *Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:17th Lok Sabha members Category:Living people Category:Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam politicians Category:Indian politicians Category:Lok Sabha members from Tamil Nadu Category:1975 births
title: Kathir Anand
